title: Kiss: Man, Person, Medium-Light Skin Tone, Medium-Dark Skin Tone
description: Depicts two men kissing, with one having a medium-light skin tone and the other a medium-dark skin tone. Represents romantic affection and love between two men.
apple_vendor_description: This representation of a kiss between a man and another person on Apple devices features two figures with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones, their faces angled towards an intimate embrace. Apple's design language applies soft, glowing highlights and smooth gradients to their features, emphasizing tenderness and affection. The rounded contours of their heads and the gentle suggestion of lips meeting convey a feeling of romantic connection and heartfelt warmth, as is characteristic of Apple's expressive emoji renderings.
